effect.diamond-pearl: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses. Inflicts regular damage.
effect.platinum: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses. Inflicts regular damage.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses. Inflicts regular damage.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user explodes to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.
flavor_text.platinum: The user explodes to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user explodes to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.
